channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: John Paul Ii In The Heart Of History
channel.desc: John Paul II deeply touched the lives of many during his Pontificate. Learn about the many ways that he had spread the Gospel of Our Lord throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Roamin' Catholic
channel.desc: When Jacek gets frustrated with math homework, Pete and Rob come to the rescue and learn a bit about Holy numbers in Scripture along the way. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary For Kids
channel.desc: From the Resurrection of Jesus to the Crowning of Mary as Queen of Heaven and Earth, this delightfully animated program both inspires as well as teaches children the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint John Paul Ii: The Spiritual Legacy
channel.desc: Joanna Bogle and Clare Anderson reflect on the life and legacy of Saint John Paul II as they travel throughout various parts of his childhood town in Poland. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy read comments and take calls about Hallowtide, and how All Hallow?s Eve, All Saint?s Day, and All Soul?s Day inspire a pursuit of holiness in this life and the next. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother explains the virtue of modesty and how as God's temple, we should be well-informed on the way we dress. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Glorious Mysteries of the Resurrection, Ascension, Pentecost, Assumption and The Coronation of May help us to receive the graces of faith in the Eternal Life, desire for Heaven, docility to the Holy Spirit, a holy death and the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: The exploration of St. Peter's remarkable life continues with a visit to many of the Holy Land sites where he faced his most difficult trials as an apostle and servant of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the Reformation, the usual term for the religious movement which made its appearance in Western Europe in the sixteenth century, and which, while ostensibly aiming at an internal renewal of the Church, really led to a great revolt against it, and an abandonment of the principal Christian beliefs. The Reformation was inaugurated in Germany when Luther affixed his celebrated theses to the doors of the church at Wittenberg, 31 October, 1517. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Nicaragua: Seigneur, Accorde Nous La Paix
channel.desc: Au Nicaragua, le 18 avril 2018, le pr?sident Daniel Ortega a introduit des r?formes au r?gime de retraite qui ont ?t? rejet?es par la majorit? de la population. Des manifestations contre les r?formes ont ?t? violemment r?prim?es par les forces sp?ciales progouvernementales. Des centaines de gens ont ?t? tu?s et des milliers ont ?t? bless?s. L'?glise, en soignant les bless?s, en prot?geant les dissidents cherchant refuge contre les foules progouvernementales, en travaillant ? la m?diation, est devenue elle-m?me une cible. Le documentaire, ? travers les yeux des dirigeants et des jeunes catholiques, raconte l'histoire de la r?pression politique en cours, les efforts de l'?glise pour apporter la paix et la souffrance des fid?les. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fathers For Good
channel.desc: Fr. Francis Gustilo and Frank Padilla discuss the need for men to know and accept themselves while taking responsibility for their personal lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: In his LIVE, interactive Bible study, Fr. Mitch begins looking at the second servant song in Isaiah 49, describing the Messiah?s mission, glory, divine origin, and purpose. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Defenders Of Faith In Word And Deed
channel.desc: The forty Martyrs of England and Wales were Canonized in 1970, and include St. Cuthbert Maine, John Southwarth, Edmund Arrowsmith, Margaret Clitherow. Many were imprisoned and executed for attending and offering Holy Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Pilate questions Jesus about his kingship, wondering if it is of this world. In response, Jesus far transcends the limits of his understanding. For our salvation, we must recognize Jesus? eternal kingship in our lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Professor, author, and Catholic speaker, John Acquaviva, joins Jim and Joy to describe the strong connection between sports and body image, through the lens of the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: He saved Rome from destruction, promoted unity in the Church, deepened our understanding of Our Lord, and forged a better understanding of the place and role of the Pope. Learn more about this truly titanic figure and Doctor of the Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Liberia: Rimes Et Rythmes Du Liberia
channel.desc: Sur la c?te ouest de l'Afrique se trouve le petit pays du Liberia. Avec une population d'environ 3 millions d'habitants, il est un des pays les plus anciens d'Afrique et l'un des plus pauvres du monde. La vie politique lib?rienne est rest?e relativement calme jusqu'au coup d'?tat militaire de 1980, suivi par une guerre civile qui a fait plus de 200 000. Les Lib?riens l?ont qualifi?e de leur troisi?me guerre mondiale. Selon Human Rights Watch, plus de 15 000 enfants soldats ont combattu. Des pr?tres ont ?t? assassin?s, tandis que l'infrastructure de l'?glise a ?t? an?antie. L'ancien pr?sident du Liberia, Charles Taylor, a ?t? condamn? ? 50 ans de r?clusion par un tribunal pour crimes de guerre appuy? par l'ONU. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Live
channel.desc: George Weigel discusses the approaching 60th anniversary of the closing of Vatican II, asking if its teachings are still relevant and if its evangelical purpose has been fulfilled. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord explore the life of the founder of the Salesian order, St. John Bosco, and his work to provide for the poor children of Italy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Doug Keck and his expert panelists discuss whether Vatican II was a ?development? or a ?rupture? of the tradition of what had come before by pastorally trying a new approach. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite a litany in honor of the Most Blessed Sacrament from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Good Or Evil: Who Decides?
channel.desc: The government often tries to make civil rights out of moral wrongs. Apologist and author Dr. Raymond De Souza explains why the state should not be looked at as an authority of morality. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: Fr. Alfred McBride explains how the Book of Revelation contains hope and encouragement amidst Saint John?s prophetic and apocalyptic writings for catastrophic times. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Journey Home

channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Chris Stefanick shares his journey, venturing to change the world through the word of God as a young man, what inspires him to keep going, and how to discern such a vocation. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Freedom And Authority

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Melvin and Fr. Jonathan Dumlao, IVE, analyze St. Louis de Montfort and Pope St. John Paul II?s devotion of total consecration; a Marian devotee discusses her son's heart condition. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Brenden Thompson, CEO of Catholic Voices, shares how his organization works to improve the Church's representation in media and give Catholics confidence to share the Church's message. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Paul Of The Cross
channel.desc: An EWTN original docudrama depicts the holy life of St. Paul of the Cross, who overcame a perilous childhood to become the founder of a religious order devoted to the Passion of Jesus. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Total Consecration To Jesus Through Mary
channel.desc: Fr. Melvin and Fr. Thomas Steinke, IVE, explore great Marian saints throughout history; a Marian devotee discusses his battle with leukemia. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Mary McClernon dives deeply into the effectiveness of the Rosary and the battles it?s won, countries it?s saved, bodies it?s healed, souls it?s rescued, and hearts it?s comforted. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews Archbishop Gabriel Blamo Snosio Jubwe about the Church?s commitment to reconciliation efforts after the brutal civil war affecting the country of LIberia. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: We take you to the ancient walls of the old Temple Mount for the fourth joyful mystery. In the temple, Jesus is presented by Mary and Joseph, eternally declaring God?s mission for his Son to save people from their sins. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: The thrilling story of Christopher Columbus?s first sea voyage as a boy to his first step ashore in the Americas. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: When Wendy and Duncan ignore the donut cookbook and create a new flavor so awful that the Donut Man has to close the shop, Fr. Joe teaches the kids why they must follow God's commandments and listen to His Word. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica sheds light on the Our Father prayer, and why we pray this prayer every day. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Polycarp
channel.desc: When the Roman proconsul demands all citizens to worship Caesar, Polycarp and other Christians must find the courage to stand up for their faith against the growing threat of persecution. (90 minutes).

channel.desc: This channel is off air, or it has temporarily no EPG data yet.
